CustomField.description: Check this Comments/Questions field should be displayed on event Reg. pages. Ex.: "Please let us know if you have a question for one of our speakers or a comment regarding an important issue facing agencies in your area. We will set aside time during the summit for a live Q&A and discussion with our key government speakers to address as many questions/comments as possible. Please note your questions will be anonymous."
CustomField.label: Show Comment Question
